data.name: Wildlife Park 2 - Domestic Animals
data.detailed_description:
Domestic Animal-Package: New cute pets, which you can mind, will play inside your zoo.
Highlind and norwich terrier, old german sheep dog, european domestic animal and carthusian looking forward for a new home!
data.about_the_game:
Domestic Animal-Package: New cute pets, which you can mind, will play inside your zoo.
Highlind and norwich terrier, old german sheep dog, european domestic animal and carthusian looking forward for a new home!
data.short_description:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10/8/7/VISTA/2000/XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium IV 2 GHz or compatible
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8.1 compatible, 64 MB RAM, Pixelshader 1.1, Vertexshader 1.1
  • DirectX: Version 8.1
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: ATTENTION: Does not work with any Wildlife Park Retail Versions
